posts.post_content:
I have a circa 1910-11 8-count Sovereign cigarette pack available for sale.  The pack is unopened, however given that it's an 8-count, it would not hold a card.  No tax stamp.  Overall, VG+ condition with some paper loss to the front as depicted in the photo below.  $185

[IMG]http://baseballandtobacco.com/images/sovereign8.gif[/IMG]
